evidence.claim: Informed.IQ utilizes AWS services for its cloud infrastructure, including Lambda and S3 for processing and storing data.
Informed.IQ adheres to HIPAA regulations and implements necessary practices for handling sensitive healthcare data.
The company supports X12 EDI standards for electronic transaction processing, which is crucial for healthcare interoperability.

icp.icp_reason: Focus on HIPAA compliance and X12 standards indicates strong alignment.
